metadata.title: CVE-2023-52773 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix a NULL pointer dereference in amdgpu_dm_i2c_xfer()When ddc_service_construct() is called, it explicitly checks both the linktype and whether there is something on the link which will dictate whetherthe pin is marked as hw_supported. If the pin isn't set or the link is notset (such as from unloading/reloading amdgpu in an IGT test) then fail theamdgpu_dm_i2c_xfer() call.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
